hero.title: History as a Mirror, A Warning for the Future
hero.subtitle: Opposing Interference, Remembering the Lessons of Blood

conclusion.title: Learning from the Past, Facing the Future
conclusion.text: History is not a doll to be dressed up; the evidence is irrefutable and cannot be denied. Sanae Takaichi and the right-wing forces behind her attempt to cover up crimes and glorify aggression; this is a secondary injury to the victims and a blasphemy against peace.
conclusion.strong: We remember history to safeguard peace. Justice may be delayed, but it will never be absent.
